title: Vanilla and orange cheesecake with almond sponge, orange and cardamom syrup
description: The base of this cheesecake uses a homemade almond sponge, but you could use shop-bought good-quality sponge if you’re short on time.Equipment and Preparation: You will need 2 x 8cm x 7cm/11in x 2¾in deep chefs’ rings.
ingredients: 10 oranges, juiced (to make about 400ml/14fl oz orange juice)
1 orange, peeled, cut into small pieces
